title: My Portfolio
text:
Hi, I’m Sriya Pothula and I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in Data Analytics Engineering at George Mason University.
I am a driven SAP S&M Analyst with a strong background in business systems, process optimization, and data analytics. Leveraging SAP Sales and Distribution (S&D) module expertise, adept at analyzing complex sales and marketing data to drive strategic decision-making and improve operational efficiency. Eager to learn new things and work on competitive tasks.
